text_block_list.text:
――On a certain day off, I happened to spot 
a rather cheerful looking Mejiro Mcqueen.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hmm, hmm, hmm… ♪ Go, go, let's go, Victories!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I've been waiting for this day for a long time♪

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I need to quickly slip into the karaoke 
room before anyone notices, or else――
choice_data_list: Going to karaoke?
Going to karaoke?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ahhh!!? T-T-Trainer…?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Mmm… y-yes, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I was, uhh… yes, I was thinking of 
practicing for the Winning Live!
choice_data_list: Then I'll go with you.
Then I'll go with you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Eh? Trainer, you're thinking of tagging along?
choice_data_list:
You're practicing for the Winning Live, right? 
I'll help you.

You're practicing for the Winning Live, right? 
I'll help you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh, is that right… Thank you very much. 
In that case, let's go in together…

I had a suspicious feeling that something was off with 
Mejiro Mcqueen, so I decided to follow her along.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Phew, I say that about wraps it up.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What did you think of the song I just sang? If you have 
any suggestions for improvement, please let me know.

Even after singing a few songs, Mejiro McQueen 
doesn't appear to be having much fun.
What happened to her cheerful mood earlier?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, is something wrong?
choice_data_list: Did I get in your way…?
Did I get in your way…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Get in my way…?! No, that's not…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's definitely not it! It's… how should I put it into words―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …… I suppose it's better to be honest with you here.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To tell the truth, the reason I came to karaoke wasn't 
to practise the Winning Live. It was actually to―

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ……… I-I actually wanted to sing a cheering song.
choice_data_list: Cheering song?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That's right… I'm talking about those cheering songs 
that spectators sing loudly during sports games…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I enjoy watching a little bit of sports… but really, 
it's something I'm only interested in a little bit!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
On my days off, I sometimes go to karaoke clubs by myself 
like this and enjoy singing cheering songs.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So today, I actually planned to…
choice_data_list: Then let's sing!
Then let's sing!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
T-there's no way I can do that! Just the thought of acting 
childish and frolicking around, it's just too much…!
choice_data_list: Well, then I'll sing.
Well, then I'll sing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: What…? You, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: W-w-wait! But I've been holding out all this time……!
choice_data_list: Then let's sing together!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, but to show you such an unrefined side――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: … Wait, the song has already started playing!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Mmm… If this is how it's going to be, then I have no choice!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Go for it!!!! YU・TA・KA!!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Go for it!!!!!!! YU・TA・KA!!!!!

At first, Mejiro Mcqueen seemed embarrassed, 
but she gradually got into the music.

Towards the end, she was shouting with such 
enthusiasm as if she were at a sports stadium.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe… It was a little bit embarrassing, but it was fun 
to be able to sing with everything I have.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Doing this makes me feel like watching a sports game right now.
choice_data_list: How did you come to love watching sports?
How did you come to love watching sports?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That's a good question… I think it's mainly 
because of the atmosphere at the venue.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a horse girl of the Mejiro family, I strive 
to be disciplined and composed at all times.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The first time I went to a sporting event, I was very 
surprised by the atmosphere at the venue.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It's an environment where you can be as excited 
as you want. A space where you can cheer passionately 
and not stand out too much…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I find the peculiar sense of freedom at the 
stadium very refreshing and fascinating.
choice_data_list: You've discovered a new kind of fun.
You've discovered a new kind of fun.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I believe that's exactly it.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Well then, let's wrap up our conversation for now and 
sing the next song. Which one should we go for?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Ugh…… I'm feeling so embarrassed now. I can't believe 
I let loose and shouted out like that……
choice_data_list: But it looked like you were having a great time.
But it looked like you were having a great time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Yes, well that's because… it's been a while since 
I was able to have so much fun singing like that.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …… However, Trainer. At the very least, keep this promise.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Please do not talk to anyone about today. And, if possible, 
forget about everything today entirely please…
